channel.title: [PICS]How to hack DragonFable
channel.description:
Well i'm going to teach you how to do some kool hacks on dragon fable.
[center]Experince Hack[/center]
First of all your going to need the Cheat Engine which you can get at...
[code]http://www.cheatengine.org/download.php[/code]
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/Download.jpg[/img]
Once you have installed that then go to...
[code]http://www.dragonfable.com/df-signup.asp[/code]
And sign up there if you don't already have an account. Then click play on the homepage and sign in.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/login.jpg[/img]
After you sign in create a charater if you don't already have one. Then click Play!
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/PLay.jpg[/img]
Ok now for the fun :). Start up the Cheat Engine.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/CheatEngine.jpg[/img]
One you have the Cheat Engine up , Click the blinking computer in the corner.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/computer.jpg[/img]
Now click on the button that says Window list and find dragon fable and click ok. What that did was make cheat engine know what process your editing or trying to use CE with.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/windowlist.jpg[/img]
Ok go fight a monster and click the quest icon.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/questicon.jpg[/img]
Take the amount of exp you got and multiply its by 8.
[code]EXPx8=#[/code]
Go to the Cheat Engine and put that number in the Value and hit first scan.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/firstscan.jpg[/img]
You should get a bunch of numbers on the left.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/alotnumbers.jpg[/img]
We have to try and get only 1 number... So what we do is go kill another monster and then go to the quest tab again and multiply the experince you have now by 8. After you get your new number put it in the vaule and click next scan.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/secondscan.jpg[/img]
Now you should end up with 1 number! Double click the number so that it goes down to the bottom.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/1number.jpg[/img]
Now double click the vaule and change it too 100000000 and push ok.
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/changevalue.jpg[/img]
BE SURE TO TRICK THE BOX!
[b]PIC:[/b] [IMG]http://i18.photobucket.com/albums/b147/everboy123/tickbox.jpg[/img]
Just kill a monster and you should get a level!!
[size=15pt][b]Coming Soon Tutrials:[/b][/size] [b]HP Hack[/b]
[b]MP Hack[/b]
[b]Money Hack[/b]
[b]Damage Hack[/b]
[b]Crit Hack[/b]

item.title: [PICS]How to hack DragonFable
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

You’re all idiots. If you have flash 7 then just search for that value in ‘Double’ but if you have Flash 8+ then you have to times that value by 8.

I found this nice guide on the CheatEngine Forums that tought me how to hack games such as The Sims, Zoo Tycoon etc. It was made by ‘Dudeofthed’, anybody heard of him? No? Ok, go to CheatEngine Forums and go to Cheat Engine Tutorials. Now go to te Game Specific Sub-Forum (Child-board) and find the title: ‘The Sims v1 - Beginners Guide | Unlimited Personality Points’. That really taught me alot.

And he said that that was the first bitmap tutorial to be ever created (I think on memory).

Read full topic

DragonFable is Not a Adventure Quest 2.

@llib wrote:

h4xor.jpg754×669

Woot guess I’m a 1337 h4x0r now huh? Seriously anyone could have figured this one out…and if you want free dragon ammys literally just search it in google and watch the vids on youtube.

@3.65 kilos It works all the time its just that, every time you go into a new quest you have to find the adress again, it changes with every quest.

Also I found a pretty fun thing, find your health value, and then click ‘freeze’ when you get hurt it jumps back to the number it was when you freezed it.
